data.text: Tantunna Ala xa!
Nde nɔɛ Alatalaa wali gbeene birin ma fe falɛ?
Sɛwan na kanne xa
Alatala, i nɛma i ya yamaan maliyɛ waxatin naxan yi,
alogo n xa i ya yama sugandixin sabatixin to,
Nxu bata yulubin liga
Nxu benbane to yi Misiran yamanani,
Koni a yi e rakisi a xili binyena fe ra,
A yi falan ti Gbala Baan xili ma,
Ala yi e rakisi na muxune ma
E yɛngɛ faane yi faxa igeni.
Nayi, e yi la a fala xuine ra,
Koni Ala naxan ligaxi,
Xɔɔyin yi e suxu tonbonni
E naxan maxɔdin,
E yi Nabi Musa maxɔxɔlɔn fɔlɔ,
Bɔxɔn dɛɛn yi rabi a Datan gerun.
Tɛɛn yi e ganla gan,
E yi xɛmaan nafala ɲinge dii sawura suxuren na Horebe Geyaan ma,
E yi Ala binyen masara ɲinge dii sawuran na
E ɲinan Ala xɔn
A kabanako feene liga Xami bɔnsɔnna yamanani,
Ala yi a fala a e raxɔrima nɛn,
Awa, e yi e mɛ na bɔxɔ faɲin fan na
E yi lu a mafalɛ e bubune kui.
Nanara, a yi a kɔlɔ e xili ma,
a yi e yixɛtɛne raxuya ayi siyane yɛ,
Alaa yamaan Baali-Peyori li waxatin naxan yi,
E kɛwanle yi Ala raxɔlɔ e ma
Koni Finexasi yi keli,
Ala yi na yatɛ tinxinna ra a xa
E yi Ala raxɔlɔ Meriba igene dɛ,
E yi a liga Musa xɔlɔxin yi falan ti xaxilitareyani.
E mɔn mi siya gbɛtɛne faxa
E yi basan siyane ra,
E yi e suxurene batu.
E yi e dii xɛmɛne nun dii tɛmɛne ba saraxane ra ɲinanne xa.
E diidine faxa naxanye mi fefe kolon.
E yi e yɛtɛ xɔsi e kɛwanle xɔn.
Nanara, Alatala yi xɔlɔ a yamaan ma.
A yi e rabeɲin siyane yii,
E yaxune yi e ɲaxankata,
A yi a muxune xunba sanɲa ma wuyaxi,
Koni, a to e wuga xuiin mɛ,
A yi a miri a layirina fe ma.
Ala yi a liga a naxanye a yamaan suxi
Alatala nxɔ Ala, nxu rakisi.
Barikan xa bira Alatala xa,
